meanings.sent1: Her dress was the flossiest one at the party.
meanings.sent2: The flossiest fabric felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The cat's flossiest toy was a shiny ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The flossiest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The flossiest flowers in the garden sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The hotel suite was the flossiest accommodation in town.
meanings.sent2: She wore the flossiest gown to the ball.
meanings.sent3: The flossiest restaurant in the city served gold-plated desserts.
meanings.sent4: The flossiest car on the lot gleamed in the showroom.
meanings.sent5: The flossiest jewelry in the store caught everyone's eye.
